chav1961.purelib.basic.interfaces.LoggerFacade

  • Packages that use LoggerFacade 
    Package Description
    chav1961.purelib.basic
    This package contains a set of classes for the basic abilities of the library
    chav1961.purelib.basic.interfaces
    This package contains all interfaces for the basic abilities of the library

    • Uses of LoggerFacade in chav1961.purelib.basic

      Classes in chav1961.purelib.basic that implement LoggerFacade 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractLoggerFacade
      This class implements basic functionality for the LoggerFacade interface.
      class  DefaultLoggerFacade
      This class is an implementation of LoggerFacade interface for the java.util.logging package.
      class  NullLoggerFacade
      This class is an implementation of LoggerFacade interface for the empty target log file.
      class  StandardJRELoggerFacade
      This class is an implementation of LoggerFacade interface for the java.util.logging target log file.
      class  SystemErrLoggerFacade
      This class is an implementation of LoggerFacade interface for the System.err target log file.

    • Uses of LoggerFacade in chav1961.purelib.basic.interfaces

      Methods in chav1961.purelib.basic.interfaces that return LoggerFacade 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LoggerFacade LoggerFacade.message(LoggerFacade.Severity level, LoggerFacade.LoggerCallbackInterface callback)
      Log message to logger file if the severity level is available now
      LoggerFacade LoggerFacade.message(LoggerFacade.Severity level, java.lang.String format, java.lang.Object... parameters)
      Log message to logger file
      LoggerFacade LoggerFacade.message(LoggerFacade.Severity level, java.lang.Throwable exception, LoggerFacade.LoggerCallbackInterface callback)
      Log message and exception to logger file if the severity level is available now
      LoggerFacade LoggerFacade.message(LoggerFacade.Severity level, java.lang.Throwable exception, java.lang.String format, java.lang.Object... parameters)
      Log message and exception to logger file
      LoggerFacade LoggerFacade.popReducing()
      Restore current reducing algorithms from the stack.
      LoggerFacade LoggerFacade.pushReducing(java.util.Set<LoggerFacade.Reducing> reducing)
      Push current reducing algorithms and set them to new values.
      LoggerFacade LoggerFacade.setReducing(java.util.Set<LoggerFacade.Reducing> reducing)
      Set current reducing algorithms for the given logger
      LoggerFacade LoggerFacade.transaction(java.lang.String mark)
      Create transaction logger instance.
